extDescription.message: Support your shortcut input in Chrome

ctrl_shift_n.message: Opens a new window in incognito mode.

ctrl_o.message: Opens a file from your computer in Google Chrome.

ctrl_click.message: Opens the link in a new tab in the background .

ctrl_shift_click.message: Opens the link in a new tab and switches to the newly opened tab.

ctrl_shift_t.message: Reopens the last tab you've closed. Google Chrome remembers the last 10 tabs you've closed.

ctrl_1.message: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

ctrl_2.message: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

ctrl_3.message: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

ctrl_4.message: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

ctrl_5.message: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

ctrl_6.message: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

ctrl_7.message: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

ctrl_8.message: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

ctrl_w.message: Closes the current tab or pop-up.

ctrl_f4.message: Closes the current tab or pop-up.

alt_left.message: Goes to the previous page in your browsing history for the tab.

shift_backspace.message: Goes to the next page in your browsing history for the tab.

alt_right.message: Goes to the next page in your browsing history for the tab.

alt_home.message: Opens your homepage in your current window.

alt_f.message: Opens the Chrome menu, which lets you customize and control settings in Google Chrome.

alt_e.message: Opens the Chrome menu, which lets you customize and control settings in Google Chrome.

f10.message: Opens the Chrome menu, which lets you customize and control settings in Google Chrome.

ctrl_shift_b.message: Toggles the bookmarks bar on and off.

shift_alt_t.message: Sets focus on the first tool in the browser toolbar. You can then use the shortcuts to move around in the toolbar.

f6.message: Switches focus to the next keyboard-accessible pane.

shift_f6.message: Switches focus to the next keyboard-accessible pane.

ctrl_shift_delete.message: Opens the Clear Browsing Data dialog.

f1.message: Opens the Help Center in a new tab (our favorite).

esc.message: Stops the loading of your current page.

ctrl_g.message: Finds the next match for your input in the find bar.

f3.message: Finds the next match for your input in the find bar.

ctrl_shift_g.message: Finds the previous match for your input in the find bar.

shift_f3.message: Finds the previous match for your input in the find bar.

shift_enter.message: Finds the previous match for your input in the find bar.

ctrl_f5.message: Reloads your current page, ignoring cached content.

shift_f5.message: Reloads your current page, ignoring cached content.

alt_click.message: Downloads the target of the link.

ctrl_u.message: Opens the source of your current page.

ctrl_d.message: Saves your current webpage as a bookmark.

ctrl_shift_d.message: Saves all open pages as bookmarks in a new folder.

f11.message: Opens your page in full-screen mode. Press F11 again to exit full-screen.

ctrl_minus.message: Makes everything on the page smaller.

ctrl_0.message: Returns everything on the page to normal size.

home.message: Goes to the top of the page.

end.message: Goes to the bottom of the page.

ctrl_c.message: Copies highlighted content to the clipboard.

ctrl_shift_v.message: Paste content from the clipboard without formatting.

ctrl_x.message: Deletes the highlighted content and copies it to the clipboard.

shift_delete.message: Deletes the highlighted content and copies it to the clipboard.
